cancel staking: After NEST Protocal 3.6, the system revenue will be cancelled. The NEST contract will not support user staking in the future, and the staking NToken will not generate any income. You can retrieve the NToken staking in the contract through the current page or directly call the contract.
about_Dao_one: The NEST DAO repurchase function allows holders to exchange NEST or other nTokens into ETH, thereby reducing the circulation of NEST (nToken) and increasing its intrinsic value.
about_Dao_two: The actual settlement price might be different to the price shown here as the repurchase code will use the oracle price at the time of transaction execution.
about_Dao_three: There is an upper limit NEST repurchase quota (displays below) at a time. If the current quota has been reached, you might want to wait few blocks to participate later.
about_Dao_four: Be aware as the market price fluculates, the participation of repurchase might not always be favorable for you. We test our smart contract, but there are inherent risk with smart contract code. Use at your own risk.
